Evaluation of #BNT162b2 #Covid19 #Vaccine in #Children 5-11 Years of Age @NEJM 

✔️ 2 10-μg doses of #BNT162b2 administered 21 days apart was found to be safe, immunogenic, & efficacious in children 5-11 years of age
